subject: Q4 Project Roadmap Review
body:
Hi team,

I wanted to sync on the Q4 roadmap and get your feedback on the proposed timeline. We have several critical milestones coming up:

1. Backend API completion by Nov 30
2. Frontend integration by Dec 15
3. User testing phase starting Dec 20

Please review the attached document and come prepared with your thoughts for our Thursday meeting at 2 PM.

Let me know if you have any concerns about these deadlines.

Best regards,
Sarah
preview: I wanted to sync on the Q4 roadmap and get your feedback on the proposed timeline...

subject: Meeting Notes - Design System Update
body:
Hi everyone,

Thanks for joining today's design system sync. Here are the key action items:

âœ… Action Items:
1. Finalize component specifications by Friday EOD
2. Update design tokens in Figma by next Monday
3. Schedule design review session for next Wednesday
4. Document new accessibility guidelines

ğŸ“ Decisions Made:
- Moving to 8px grid system
- Adopting new color palette (warm neutrals)
- Button variants reduced from 8 to 4

Let me know if I missed anything or if you have questions about your assigned tasks.

Thanks,
Alex
preview: Following up from our meeting. Here are the action items we discussed...

subject: [email-assistant] Pull Request #42 Ready for Review
body:
A pull request has been opened and is ready for your review.

ğŸ‘¤ Author: @johndoe
ğŸ“¦ Repository: email-assistant
ğŸ”€ Branch: feature/rag-improvements

ğŸ“ Description:
Implements improved RAG context retrieval using semantic chunking and re-ranking. Performance improvements show 40% better relevance scores in tests.

Changes:
- Upgraded embedding model
- Added hybrid search (dense + sparse)
- Implemented context re-ranking
- Added unit tests for new components

+247 -89 lines changed across 8 files

ğŸ”— View Pull Request: https://github.com/user/email-assistant/pull/42

subject: Reminder: Annual Performance Review Due Dec 1
body:
Hello,

This is a friendly reminder that your annual performance review is coming up.

ğŸ“… Important Dates:
- Self-assessment due: December 1
- Manager review: December 8
- Final discussion meeting: December 15

ğŸ“ What You Need to Do:
1. Complete self-assessment form (link below)
2. Gather examples of your achievements
3. List your professional development goals
4. Schedule your review meeting with your manager

ğŸ”— Access the form: [Performance Review Portal]

Please don't hesitate to reach out if you have questions about the process.
